description.full: Play one quarter of gameplay from the 2012 NBA Finals as the Miami Heat take on the Oklahoma City Thunder.   Choose to play online over Xbox LIVE (Xbox Gold Subscription required) or offline against the AI or a friend sitting next to you.  This NBA 2K13 demo also includes full Kinect support, allowing you to set strategies, call plays, make substitutions and more with intuitive verbal commands.
description.short: Play one quarter of gameplay from the 2012 NBA Finals as the Miami Heat take on the Oklahoma City Thunder.   Choose to play online over Xbox LIVE (Xbox Gold Subscription required) or offline against the AI or a friend sitting next to you.  This NBA 2K13 demo also includes full Kinect support, allowing you to set strategies, call plays, make substitutions and more with intuitive verbal commands.
